title: Blueprint, "Round Table, Wood and Metal", 1937-1938
inscribed: Inscribed in yellow color pencil, lower right: # 1647; inscribed in blueprint, lower right: F.S. LAYOUT/OF WOOD & METAL TABLE/TYPE 43311; below, in yellow color pencil: FINISH SATIN AL.; below: DRWG # 43311; upper right, upside down: Polished Brass; lower right: ORDER/NO. 170; lower right corner: # 170 [crossed out] # 1647; dimensions, notes, materials in blueprint
description: Plan and perspective drawing for circular table. Wood table top with polished brass base of squared tubes, geometric pattern.
